titles: Informations, or a protestation, and a treatise from Scotland Seconded with D. Reignoldes his letter to Sir Francis Knollis. And Sir Francis Knollis his speach in Parliament. All suggesting the vsurpation of papal bishops.
author: Knollys, Francis, Sir, d. 1643.
Rainolds, John, 1549-1607.
Simson, Patrick, 1556-1618.
notes: The "protestation offered to the Parliament .. 1 Iulij 1606" was written by Patrick Simson (DNB).
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Sheets A-D and F are in two different settings, indiscriminately mixed.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
